title: gotour offline: syntax highlighting disabled on page refresh
body:
by **johan.samyn**: 
Go version: 1.0.2
Platform: Win7 (32bit)
browser: Firefox 15.0.1
I just installed the new Gotour offline, and tried the syntax highlighting. I noticed
that when one refreshes the page (f.i. hit F5 in Firefox) then the syntax highlighting
setting is always set back to "off". (The setting for showing the line numbers
however is correctly maintained, whether on or off.)
